I've started Ubuntu with the Dapper Drake.

Now I find myself sharing the spirit of Ubuntu by giving away CDs burned with *buntu distros, encouraging people to change or at least to try the Live CD, helping in installations and configurations and translating applications to Portuguese.
I'm currently writing many posts about the bug #1 of Ubuntu and other *buntu distros. We'll fix it sooner or later :)
